language.entry: {colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.
{colour_start|voivode_colour}By the gods ... what have I become?{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The light ... that light burns my eyes and weakens me!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Turn off that light! please turn it OFF!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}"DEVOID OF LIGHT, THEIR TRUE NATURE IS REVEALED"{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I don't need to eat, I don't need to rest ... and I don't need YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Everything I eat comes out as vomit. My appetite seems to be changing ... I do not know what happens to me.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Put that food away. Just by seeing it, my guts turn upside down.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Do you want to know what can quench my hunger?{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need lifes for the master, i need lifes for the master...{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}My stomach bites me demanding a new soul to steal!.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I feel like my heart stops beating...{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}My eyes see in the shadows as if it were the clearest day.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I can hear the darkness running through my veins.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}My body dies ... but nevertheless I feel more alive than ever!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Kneel before the master and he will be lenient with you.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The master calls me, he has promised me eternal life!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I can smell how life emanates from your bodies.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I will devour who dares to cross my way!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I'M NOT AFRAID OF DEATH. DEATH IS AFRAID OF ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I'm one with the shadows of the night!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I am the one you need to fear in the dark!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}What is the night a sanguine colour, my brothers!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}There's no life to restore in this body!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I ONLY OBEY THE VOICE OF THE MASTER!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I HAVE LOST CONTROL! I HAVE TOTALLY LOST CONTROL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I NEED LIFEFORCE AND I NEED IT NOW!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I feel the darkness coming from this place!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}What pitiful creature, bound to your light!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I will take your head to the teacher as a gift!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The master will reward me for such a magnificent combat!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}You should drink from the eternal chalice. BE ONE OF US!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The object talks to me. I cannot persist.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Such precious power, coming from this artifact!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power!{colour_end}

A ravaging influence extends through the Hamlet, gaining adepts who seek refuge in the night and their subsistence in the living. In the light of the full moon can be seen this wicked flock to the feet of his Shepherd.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} ist dem Bund mit der Nacht eingegangen .
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} ist dem Pakt mit der Nacht eingegangen.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} hat seine Treue zur Nacht bewiesen.
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Bei den Göttern... Was habe ich getan?{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Das Licht... Es brennt und schwächt mich!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Macht das Licht aus! Bitte, es BRENNT!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}"SO GANZ OHNE LICHT IST IHRE WAHRE NATUR OFFENBART"{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich brauche nicht zu essen, ich brauche nicht zu ruhn', aber ich brauche DICH!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Alles, was ich esse, schmeckt nach Erbrochenem. Mein Appetit scheint sich zu ändern...seltsam.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Packt das Essen weg. Bei bloßem Anblick dreht sich schon mein Magen um.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Willst du wissen, was meinen Hunger stillt?{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich brauche Seelen für den Meister... Seelen für den Meister...{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Mein Magen knurrt schon im Befehl, eine neue Seele für ihn zu finden!.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich fühle mich so als würde mein Herz bersten...{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich sehe in der tiefsten Nacht wie am hellichten Tag.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich fühle, wie die Finsternis durch meine Adern fließt.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Mein Körper zerfällt... trotzdem fühle ich mich lebendiger als je zuvor!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Verbeugt euch vor meinem Meister und er wird Gnade zeigen.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Der Meister ruft mich, er versprach mir ewiges Leben!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich rieche, wie das Leben aus euren Körpern fließt.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich verschlinge alles und jeden, der mich aufhält!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}ICH HABE KEINE ANGST VOR DEM TOD... ER HAT ANGST VOR MIR!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich bin es, den du in der Finsternis fürchten solltest!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}In welchem Blutrot erstrahlt heute der Mond, meine Brüder?{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}In diesem Körper gibt es nichts Lebendiges zu heilen!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}ICH BRAUCHE LEBENSKRAFT UND ICH BRAUCHE SIE JETZT!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich fühle, wie die Finsternis aus diesem Platz austritt!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich werde deinen Schädel dem Lehrer schenken!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Der Meister wird mich sicher für einen herausragenden Kampf loben!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ihr solltet wirklich vom Kelch der Jugend trinken. WERDET EINER VON UNS!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Dieser Gegenstand spricht zu mir. Was für ein beharrliches Wesen.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ich kann nicht diesem ketzerischem Vergnügen wiederstehen!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Solch eine besondere Kraft, die dieses Artefakt ausstrahlt!{colour_end}

Verheerende Ereignisse breiten sich über das Dorf aus, die Schüler, welche sich der Nacht untergeben und die Lebenden bloß noch als Versorgung ansehen, aufnehmen. In dem Licht des Vollmonds kann die verfluchte Herde zu Füßen ihres unheiligen Hirten gesehen werden.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.

{colour_start|voivode_colour}The light ... that light burns my eyes and weakens me!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Turn off that light! please turn it OFF!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}"DEVOID OF LIGHT, THEIR TRUE NATURE IS REVEALED"{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I don't need to eat, I don't need to rest ... and I don't need YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}everything I eat as I vomit. My appetite seems to be changing ... I do not know what happens to me.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Put that food away. Just by seeing it, my guts turn upside down.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Do you want to know what can quench my hunger?{colour_end}

{colour_start|voivode_colour}My stomach bites me demanding a new soul to steal!.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I feel like my heart stops beating...{colour_end}

{colour_start|voivode_colour}I can hear the darkness running through my veins.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}My body dies ... but nevertheless I feel more alive than ever!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Kneel before the master and he will be lenient with you.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The master calls me, he has promised me eternal life!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I can smell how life emanates from your bodies.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I will devour who dares to cross my way!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I'M NOT AFRAID OF DEATH. DEATH IS AFRAID OF ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Im one with the shadows of the night!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I am the one you need to fear in the dark!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}What is the night's colour sanguine my brothers!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}There's no life to restore in this body!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I ONLY OBEY THE VOICE OF THE MASTER!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I HAVE LOST CONTROL! I HAVE TOTALLY LOST CONTROL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I NEED LIFEFORCE AND I NEED IT NOW!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I feel the darkness coming from this place!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I will take your head to the teacher as a gift!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The master will reward me for such a magnificent combat!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}you should drink from the eternal chalice. BE ONE OF US!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The Object talks to me. I cannot persist.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Such precious power, coming from this artifact{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power{colour_end}

A ravaging influence extends through the Hamlet, gaining adepts who seek refuge in the night and their subsistence in the living. In the light of the full moon can be seen this wicked flock to the feet of his Shepherd.
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Мне нужны ни отдых, ни еда... мне даже не нужны вы ВСЕ!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я тут же исторгаю всё что чъем. Кажется мои пристрастия в еде изменились... Даже не знаю что со мной происходит.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Убери это хрючево. От одного взгялда меня начинает тошнить.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Хочешь знать, чем можно утолить мой голод?{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я должен принести жертву повелителю... я должен... жертву...{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Мои глаза видят смотрят сквозь ночь, будто стоит ясный день.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Мое тело умирает ... но я чувствую себя как никогда живым!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Преклоните колени перед повелителем, и он будет к вам снисходителен.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Повелитель зовёт меня, он обещает мне вечную жизнь!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я чую как жизнь уходит из ваших тел.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я разорву любого кто встанет на моём пути!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я НЕ БОЮСЬ СМЕРТИ! СМЕРТЬ БОИТСЯ МЕНЯ!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я единственный кого стоит бояться в ночи!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}В этом теле не осталось ничего живого!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я ТЕРЯЮ КОНТРОЛЬ! Я ПОЛНОСТЬЮ ТЕРЯЮ КОНТРОЛЬ!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я чувствую как тьма распространяется от этого места!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Повелитель вознаградит меня за такую замечательную битву!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Тебе необходимо испить из вечного кубка. БУДЬ С НАМИ!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Эта вещь говорит со мной. Я не могу устоять.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Я не могу стоять перед этим ПОРОЧНЫМ НАСЛАЖДЕНИЕМ!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Сколь сладостна сила, исходящая от этого артефакта...{colour_end}

Разрушительная сила распространяет своё влияние в окрестностях, привлекая тех , кто ищет убежище в ночи и пропитания среди живых. В свете полной луны можно увидеть как нечестивая толпа следует за своим Пастырем.
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Światło ... to światło wypala mi oczy i osłabia mnie!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Zgaś to świato! Proszę ZGAŚ to światło!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Nie potrzebuję jedzenia, nie potrzebuję odpoczynku ... i nie potrzebuję CIEBIE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Wszystko co zjem zwymiotuję. Mój apetyt wydaje się zmieniać ... Nie wiem co się ze mną dzieje!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Odłóż to jedzenie. Przewraca mi się w żołądku na sam widok.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Czy chcesz wiedzieć, co może zaspokoić mój głód?{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}TWOJA DUSZA WYDAJE SIĘ BYĆ BARDZIEJ APETYCZNA!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}MUSZĘ ŻYĆ DLA MISTRZA, MUSZĘ ŻYĆ DLA MISTRZA, MUSZĘ ŻYĆ DLA MISTRZA...{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}moje oczy widzą w cieniu, jakby to był najczystszy dzień.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Mogę usłyszeć ciemność płynącą w moich żyłach.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Moje ciało umiera... ale niemniej jednak czuję się bardziej żywy niż kiedykolwiek!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Ukłoń się mistrzowi, a on będzie dla ciebie wyrozumiały.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Mistrz mnie woła, obiecał mi wieczne życie.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Czuję, jak życie emanuje z twojego ciała.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}POŻRĘ KAŻDEGO KTO WEJDZIE MI W DROGĘ!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}NIE OBAWIAM SIĘ ŚMIERCI. TO ŚMIERĆ OBAWIA SIĘ MNIE!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}W TYM CIELE NIE OSTAŁA SIĘ KRZTA ŻYCIA!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}JA... JA MUSZĘ... JA MUSZĘ TO ZROBIĆ!{colour_end}

Niszczący wpływ rozciąga się na osadzie, w ten sposób zdobywa uczniów którzy chcą chronić się w objęciach nocy w celu utrzymania się przy życiu. W świetle pełni księżyca można zobaczyć tę nikczemną trzodę u stóp ich pasterza.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.
{colour_start|notable}{?hero_name}%s{colour_end} has deepened his devotion to the night.

{colour_start|voivode_colour}The light ... that light burns my eyes and weakens me!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Turn off that light! please turn it OFF!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}"DEVOID OF LIGHT, THEIR TRUE NATURE IS REVEALED"{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I don't need to eat, I don't need to rest ... and I don't need YOU!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}everything I eat as I vomit. My appetite seems to be changing ... I do not know what happens to me.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Put that food away. Just by seeing it, my guts turn upside down.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Do you want to know what can quench my hunger?{colour_end}

{colour_start|voivode_colour}my eyes see in the shadows as if it were the clearest day.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I can hear the darkness running through my veins.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}My body dies ... but nevertheless I feel more alive than ever!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Kneel before the master and he will be lenient with you.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The master calls me, he has promised me eternal life!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I can smell how life emanates from your bodies.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I will devour who dares to cross my way!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I'M NOT AFRAID OF DEATH. DEATH IS AFRAID OF ME!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Im one with the shadows of the night!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I am the one you need to fear in the dark!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}What is the night's colour sanguine my brothers!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}There's no life to restore in this body!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I ONLY OBEY THE VOICE OF THE MASTER!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I HAVE LOST CONTROL! I HAVE TOTALLY LOST CONTROL!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I NEED LIFEFORCE AND I NEED IT NOW!!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I feel the darkness coming from this place!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I will take your head to the teacher as a gift!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The master will reward me for such a magnificent combat!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}you should drink from the eternal chalice. BE ONE OF US!{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}The Object talks to me. I cannot persist.{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}Such precious power, coming from this artifact{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}I need to harness this unholy power{colour_end}

A ravaging influence extends through the Hamlet, gaining adepts who seek refuge in the night and their subsistence in the living. In the light of the full moon can be seen this wicked flock to the feet of his Shepherd.
{colour_start|voivode_colour}光…那光灼伤了我的眼睛，使我变得虚弱！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}「没有光，他们的真面目将会显露」{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我不需要进食，不需要睡眠…也不需要你！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我吃什么也会吐出来。我的胃口好像变了…我到底发生什么事{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}把食物都拿走。光是看到，我的肠子就要开始翻江倒海{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我需要一些富含生命的东西！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}你想知道什么可以解缓我的饥饿感？{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我要为造主捕获生命，我要为造主捕获…{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我的胃正在撕咬着我，在渴求一个鲜活的灵魂！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我觉得我的心脏停止跳动了…{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我的眼睛即使在黑暗之中也能清晰看到一切{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我能听见黑暗之血在我的血管里流淌{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我的肉身死了…但是我却觉得自己比以往任何时候都更有活力！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}跪在造主面前，祂便会对你仁慈{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我能闻到这鲜活的生命气息{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我是你在黑暗中需要害怕的人！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}黑夜是什么颜色？是血红色！我的弟兄们！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}在这个身体里没有生命力可以恢复！！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}把你的手从我身上移开，不要碰我高贵的身体！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我控制不了自己！我完全失控了！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我需要生命力！现在我需要它！！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我会把你的头作为礼物送给造主！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}造主会因这场精彩的战斗奖励我！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}你该接受永恒圣杯的祝福，成为我等的一员！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}这物件在跟我喋喋不休，我忍不了{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我无法抗拒这种不洁的愉悦！{colour_end}
{colour_start|voivode_colour}我需要利用这种不洁的力量{colour_end}

一股毁灭性的存在扩散于小镇，那些受到夜之庇护并藏身于活者之中的存在。在圆月的光芒下，可以看见这群邪恶的羊围堵在牧羊人的脚前。

엄청난 힘이 영지를 유린하고 지나간다, 밤에 근근이 살아가는 이들이 점점 많아지고 있다. 보름달이 비출 때 이 역겨운 무리의 목자가 나타날 것이다.
